page.title: 09CLICKIMIN LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: THE {LEISURE CENTRE}WAS BUILT DURING 1984-1985.IT WAS OFFICIALLY OPENED BY{TESSA SANDERSON}THE OLYMPIC JAVELIN CHAMPION ON THE 30th OF MARCH 1985. IT COST{Â£3,000,000}TO BUILD. THE GAMES HALL IS{1000 SQUARE METRES. } THERE IS A BIG CAFETERIA WHERE YOU CAN HAVE A SNACK AND ALSO WATCH THE GAMES GOING ON. IT HAS MANY FACILITIES SUCH AS{6 BADMINTON COURTS,1 TENNIS {COURT,2 NETBALL PITCHES,1 BASKETBALL {PITCH,2 FIVE A SIDE PITCHES.} THERE IS A MULTI-GYM WHERE 12 PEOPLE CAN EXERCISE AT ONE TIME. IN THE CHANGING ROOMS THERE ARE SHOWERS. THERE ARE ALSO FACILITIES FOR THE DISABLED. THERE IS A FUNCTION ROOM WHERE YOU CAN HAVE WEDDINGS OR ANY INDOOR SPORT THAT DOESN'T TAKE UP MUCH ROOM.
